channel.title: Make non-hamachi server with bad ISP
channel.description:
:( PLEASE HELP! Ok I am pretty sure that i have opened all my ports correctly. I am still having a bit of trouble getting people to connect to my server.
You see i have a laptop, and two desktop pc's.
I PF all ports then i open my server file run.bat (To run the server)
It wont let me connect only my pc can connect
If you have any idea's why this is happening just reply.
Thank you very much for all of your help :)
